episodeList.title: Sapiens and Pandemic: A Special Discussion with Yuval Noah Harari

episode.description: Yuval Noah Harari, historian and author of Sapiens, talks with young students studying in Japan about how the world should respond to the COVID-19, and what it should do after the pandemic subsides.
episode.title: Sapiens and Pandemic: A Special Discussion with Yuval Noah Harari
